explanation:
code_hardening: Added validation for null/invalid zip file and destination path, ensured destination root and parent directories are created using mkdirs(), and used try-with-resources for ZipFile and all streams to guarantee proper cleanup.
resolve_compilation_errors: Implemented the missing static unzipToDirectory(File, String) overload referenced by existing callers, replaced raw Enumeration with Enumeration<? extends ZipEntry>, and used fully qualified class names to avoid import issues.
exception_handling: Preserved IOException/ZipException propagation consistent with existing call sites, throwing IOExceptions on invalid inputs or directory-creation failures.
logic_customization: Removed derivation of destination from zip filename, relied solely on the provided destination directory, preserved full archive directory structure via entry.getName(), and removed recursive extraction of nested .zip entries.
refactoring: Renamed locals for clarity (zip, entry, destFile), introduced a named BUFFER_SIZE constant instead of a magic number, and simplified control flow for directory entries.
misc: Removed all console logging and kept formatting/style consistent with existing Maven plugin utility methods; no new custom API calls were introduced beyond standard JDK classes.
